name: Winding Nile Wave
description: Ladies! Sorry for the hiatus! We have been working on providing you all with even higher quality, longer lasting hair! We have assured that the harvesting, wefting, and quality-control is up to our high-standards, that you may have nothing short of an easy, breezy experience! Thank you for your patience with us and we are so glad to have you back! Our Winding Nile Wave is a loose body wave texture, making styling and maintenance a breeze! This hair is 100% Virgin Malaysian. Wefts: Machine-wefted. Double-wefted. Single Drawn. Weight: Approximately 3.5oz, or 100g. Lengths: 16"-30" (when pulled taut) Bundles start at $75.00. Hair will take just seven (7) days to arrive to your doorstep when shipped inside the United States.

name: Winding Nile Wave Triple Bundle Deal
description: Our Winding Nile Wave is a loose body wave texture, making styling and maintenance a breeze! For lengths 16"-22", 3 bundles will complete a whole head. Weight: Approximately 3.5oz, or 100g. After ordering, hair will take just seven (7) days to arrive to your doorstep when shipped inside the United States. If you desire additional bundles at the time of purchase, please contact us at info@QueenoftheNileHair.com!

name: Nubian Curl/Wave Triple Bundle Deal

name: Silk Top Closure
description: Get the highly sought after look of Tyra Banks, Ciara, and Beyonce! Don the styles of these trendsetting celebrities by purchasing one of our exclusive Silk Top Closures! Silk closures allow you to conceal your natural while having what appears to be a natural leave out. This is the perfect solution for ladies going natural and would still like a beautiful weave without the stressing of their hair with daily pressing or styling. Silk closures also provide the ability to try styles that wouldn't naturally match or be easily blended with your natural texture. Enjoy freedom of choice for flawless tresses! Silk closures appear as if hair is coming from your own scalp! They take less work to prepare than the lace closure. All Silk closures will come with the following specifications, unless a customer requests otherwise: - Medium Brown Silk/Lace - 110% Density - 4x4" in Size - Natural Hair Color - Knots Invisible - Closure will match the texture and pattern ordered. (If you are ordering just a closure, please be sure to contact us regarding your texture and pattern. To avoid any delays, be sure you receive a response from us prior to ordering.) Lengths 12"-24" available!

name: U-Part & L-Part Wig Services
description: Yay! We now offer U-Part and L-Part Wig creation service on the web! If you would like your hair purchase created into a reusable wig, here is your chance! You will need to purchase your hair in addition to purchasing this service. This purchase does not include hair. U-Part and L-Part wigs are beneficial because they allow you to care for your hair with more visibility, but look like a perfect sew-in when installed! You may choose to have your wig created with or without wig combs. You may also choose to have a lace closure included with your wig. Closures will be separate and will come with an elastic black band that you may attach for glue-less application. All are 16" in length. Lace size is 3" x 4" and will come in Medium Brown. These are best used with the U-Part wig selection, but can be purchased with the L-Part wig selection below. Images for this listing do not have lace closures. Please use the "Contact" form if you have any specifications or requests! ***Please allow 7-10 days from ordering for your purchase to arrive.

name: Nubian Relaxed Triple Bundle Deal
description: For lengths 14"-22", 3 bundles are enough for a full head. Add additional bundle to the longer sets for celebrity fullness! You will love it! Our Nubian Relaxed texture is a straight, low-maintenance pattern. It has the appearance of relaxed African-American hair! Easy to blend! Easy to maintain! Very sleek and full of bounce! Simply brush through and voila! This hair is 100% Virgin Brazilian. Wefts: Machine-wefted. Double-wefted. Single Drawn. Weight: Approximately 3.5oz, or 100g. After ordering, hair will take just seven (7) days to arrive to your doorstep when shipped inside the United States. If you desire additional bundles at the time of purchase, please contact info@QueenoftheNileHair.com!

name: Lace Top Closure
description: Get the highly sought after look of Tyra Banks, Ciara, and Beyonce! Don the styles of these trendsetting celebrities by purchasing one of our exclusive Lace Top Closures! Lace closures allow you to conceal your natural while having what appears to be a natural leave out. This is the perfect solution for ladies going natural and would still like a beautiful weave without the stressing of their hair with daily pressing or styling. Lace closures also provide the ability to try styles that wouldn't naturally match or be easily blended with your natural texture. Enjoy freedom of choice for flawless tresses! Lace closures are see-through, so it may be necessary to add a piece of fabric underneath, simulating a scalp. Your knots may also need to be bleached for your lace to appear more natural. There are several YouTube tutorials that will give you detailed instructions on how to go about doing this. All Silk closures will come with the following specifications, unless a customer requests otherwise: - Medium Brown Silk/Lace - 110% Density - 4x4" in Size - Natural Hair Color - Knots Unbleached - Closure will match the texture and pattern ordered. (If you are ordering just a closure, please be sure to contact us regarding your texture and pattern. To avoid any delays, be sure you receive a response from us prior to ordering.) If you desire different specifications, please leave a comment in the Contact Us portion of our page or tweet us at @Queen0ftheNile (with a zero!). We will respond at our earliest convenience! Lengths 12"-24" available!

name: Basic Midi Dress
description: Add Class, Curves, and Confidence to your every day look! Midi Dresses are the new wardrobe must-have! Order yours for just $25 while boutiques are selling them for $45 and up! Currently available are Kelly Green, Fuschia, Rouge, Turquoise, Electric Chartreuse, Black, Royal Blue, and Orange! Two sizes are available: S/M and L/XL. Small can fit dress sizes 4-10, while L/XL can fit 12-18. Material: 95% Viscose, 5% Elastane. It is recommended that you wear neutral to dark underwear under items of lighter color. If you would like another color other than what is listed, please feel free to contact Info@QueenoftheNileHair.com! We will see if it is available! ❤ Email Info@QueenoftheNileHair.com to inquire about custom Ombre or Tie-Dye! If you would like a design done at random, select the option below! Please be mindful that these are for preorder. These take approximately 12-14 days to reach your doorstep after ordering. We will try our very best to keep ordering customers posted about their orders. This listing will change to current (not preorder) once items are in stock. Thank you!

Material: 95% Viscose, 5% Elastane. It is recommended that you wear neutral to dark underwear under items of lighter color. name: "Honor Coco" Clutch
description: Celebrate one of Fashion's greatests, Coco Chanel, with our "Honor Coco" Faux Leather Riveted clutch. Comes with a wrist handle as well as a strap! Fierce and Eyecatching for your night time outfit! You'll definitely be the talk of the town!

name: Rainbow Gem Clear Clutch
description: Our rainbow gem clutch is Perfect for ANY outfit, day or night! Pair with one of our Basic Midi Dresses and a contrasting pair of shoes to turn heads all over! Straps are an antique copper/gold color!

name: Masai Midi Dress
description:
Our Masai Midi is fit for any entrance-making queen! The bold neon pink, orange, and green vertical striped under an African tribal pattern will set you apart from everyone!

95% Viscose, 5% Elastane. Sizes 8/10, 12/14, and 16/18 available!

name: Blossom Midi Set
description:
✨SALE!✨ Embrace your inner kitten by purchasing one of our lovely midi sets! A cropped top and form-fitting midi skirt allows you to show off those summer beach bods we've all worked so hard for! 

95% Viscose, 5% Elastane. Comes with an elastic waist!

name: Indian Summer Two Piece Midi Dress
description:
Beautiful two piece bandage midi dress in hues of bright yellow, royal blue, fiery orange, and black! Zipper closure on both the bralette and midi skirt. Dress available in sizes 4, 6, 8, 10, and 12. Hook eye closure on the bralette, zipper closure on the skirt. This pattern is printed onto the fabric. The black ribbing (as seen in the bralette) is not a part of the print and is fabric. 

Please allow 10-14 days for delivery from the date of purchase. Measurements can be seen in the images.

name: Bold Boho Midi Dress
description:
✨NEW ARRIVAL!✨ Why not try this statement making midi out for size! With bold tribal and animal print combined, you can't help but be the center of attention!  Perfect for a beach bonfire! 

95% Viscose, 5% Elastane. Sizes 8/10 and 12/14 available!
